0:
# Enable AOF https://redis.io/topics/persistence#append-only-file
appendonly yes
# Disable RDB persistence, AOF persistence already enabled.
save ""
maxmemory 188743680
maxmemory-policy allkeys-lru

[ups-1]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  # pollinterval = 15
  desc = "APC Back-UPS Pro 1500"
  # vendorid = "051D"
  # productid = "0002"
  product = "Back-UPS RS 1500G FW:865.L9 .D USB FW:L9"
  serial = "4B2107P01305"
  # vendor = "American Power Conversion"
  # bus = "001"
# [ups-2]
#   driver = snmp-ups
#   privProtocol=AES
#   port = 192.168.3.82
#   desc = "APC Smart-UPS 750"
# [ups-3]
#   driver = snmp-ups
#   privProtocol=AES
#   port = 192.168.3.83
#   desc = "APC Smart-UPS 750"

[admin]
  password = secret
  actions = SET
  instcmds = ALL
  upsmon master
[upsmon]
  password = secret
  upsmon slave

MONITOR ups-1@localhost 1 admin secret master
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15

upstream:
  default:
    - tcp-tls:one.one.one.one
    - tcp-tls:dns.quad9.net
    - tcp-tls:protected.canadianshield.cira.ca
    - https://cloudflare-dns.com/dns-query
    - https://dns.quad9.net/dns-query
    - https://protected.canadianshield.cira.ca/dns-query


upstreamTimeout: 2s

conditional:
  mapping:
    ${SECRET_DOMAIN}: 10.43.131.47:53

bootstrapDns:
  upstream: tcp-tls:one.one.one.one
  ips:
  - 1.1.1.1

redis:
  address: redis-headless.database.svc:6379
  database: 2
  required: true
  connectionAttempts: 10
  connectionCooldown: 3s

blocking:
  blackLists:
    ads:
      - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/StevenBlack/hosts/master/hosts
      - https://adaway.org/hosts.txt
      - https://v.firebog.net/hosts/lists.php?type=nocross
      - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/anudeepND/blacklist/master/adservers.txt
      - https://pgl.yoyo.org/adservers/serverlist.php?hostformat=hosts&showintro=0&mimetype=plaintext
      - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bigdargon/hostsVN/master/hosts
      - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jdlingyu/ad-wars/master/hosts
      - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/FadeMind/hosts.extras/master/add.2o7Net/hosts
      - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/crazy-max/WindowsSpyBlocker/master/data/hosts/spy.txt
      - https://www.github.developerdan.com/hosts/lists/ads-and-tracking-extended.txt
    noblock: []

  clientGroupsBlock:
    default:
      - ads
      - noblock
    192.168.1.129/32:
      - noblock
    192.168.1.224/32:
      - noblock
    192.168.1.249/32:
      - noblock
    192.168.10.129/32:
      - noblock
    192.168.10.224/32:
      - noblock
    192.168.10.249/32:
      - noblock
    MBPdeMalisabeth*:
      - noblock
    Marie*:
      - noblock

clientLookup:
  upstream: tcp+udp:192.168.1.1

caching:
  prefetching: true
  minTime: 5m
  maxTime: 5m
  cacheTimeNegative: -1

prometheus:
  enable: true
  path: /metrics

ports:
  https: 443
  tls: 853
  http: 4000
certFile: /tls/tls.crt
keyFile: /tls/tls.key
logLevel: info
connectIPVersion: v4
bad ingress config - nginx config test failed
ssl certificate(s) will expire in less then a week
uninstall the latest ingress changes to allow config reloads to resume
renew expiring certificates to avoid downtime
More than 35% of all requests returned 5XX, this requires your attention

/hr/lkmgr.github.io-charts-app-template-.title: home-assistant helm release
/hr/lkmgr.github.io-charts-app-template-.name: home-assistant
/hr/lkmgr.github.io-charts-app-template-.doc:
Home Assistant

Home Assistant is a home automation platform that has many integrations. It can be used to control lights, fans, thermostats, cameras, and many other devicesn
